verses.text: After \w the|strong="H3478"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w of|strong="H4194"\w* Ahab, \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w rebelled|strong="H6586"\w* \w against|strong="H6586"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H2088"\w* Ahaziah \w had|strong="H7971"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w through|strong="H1157"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w lattice|strong="H7639"\w* \w of|strong="H4397"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w upper|strong="H5944"\w* \w room|strong="H5944"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* injured \w himself|strong="H1157"\w*. \w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* instructed \w them|strong="H7971"\w*: “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w* \w of|strong="H4397"\w* \w Baal-zebub|strong="H1176"\w*, \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w god|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H4397"\w* \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*, whether \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H5307"\w* \w recover|strong="H2421"\w* \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w injury|strong="H2483"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Tishbite|strong="H8664"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H1980"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w ask|strong="H1875"\w* \w them|strong="H5927"\w*, ‘\w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5927"\w* \w because|strong="H1097"\w* \w there|strong="H5927"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H1097"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w way|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Baal-zebub|strong="H1176"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w god|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*?’

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w get|strong="H3212"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w bed|strong="H4296"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* lying. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.’” \w So|strong="H3651"\w* Elijah \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* king, \w he|strong="H4397"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H2088"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*?”

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w replied|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, ‘\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w sending|strong="H7971"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w men|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Baal-zebub|strong="H1176"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w god|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*? \w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w get|strong="H3212"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w bed|strong="H4296"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* lying. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.’”

\w The|strong="H5927"\w* king \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w them|strong="H5927"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w sort|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* man \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w*?”

“\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hairy|strong="H8181"\w* \w man|strong="H1167"\w*,” \w they|strong="H1931"\w* answered, “\w with|strong="H4975"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w leather|strong="H5785"\w* belt around \w his|strong="H1931"\w* \w waist|strong="H4975"\w*.” “\w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* Elijah \w the|strong="H1931"\w* \w Tishbite|strong="H8664"\w*,” said \w the|strong="H1931"\w* king.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Ahaziah \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w company|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H7218"\w*. \w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H1696"\w*, \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w Man|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* declares, ‘\w Come|strong="H5927"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w*!’”

\w Elijah|strong="H1696"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w*, “If \w I|strong="H4480"\w* am \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H6030"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w*, \w may|strong="H4480"\w* fire \w come|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* consume \w you|strong="H4480"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w your|strong="H4480"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H8269"\w*.” \w And|strong="H6030"\w* fire \w came|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* consumed \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w his|strong="H4480"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H8269"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H1696"\w* another \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H8269"\w*. \w And|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Man|strong="H6030"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w*, \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* declares, ‘\w Come|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w once|strong="H7725"\w*!’”

\w Again|strong="H1696"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H1696"\w* \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*, “If \w I|strong="H4480"\w* am \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H6030"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w*, \w may|strong="H4480"\w* fire \w come|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* consume \w you|strong="H4480"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w your|strong="H4480"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* men.” \w And|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* fire \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* \w came|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* consumed \w the|strong="H4480"\w* captain \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w his|strong="H4480"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* men.

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H5650"\w*. \w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w fell|strong="H5927"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w knees|strong="H1290"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w begged|strong="H2603"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w Man|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w*, \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w yours|strong="H5650"\w* \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w precious|strong="H3365"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, fire \w has|strong="H5869"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* consumed \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*, \w with|strong="H3381"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w their|strong="H8064"\w* \w men|strong="H5315"\w*. \w But|strong="H2009"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w may|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w precious|strong="H3365"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w your|strong="H4480"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1696"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.” \w So|strong="H6965"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H1696"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H1696"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* King Ahaziah, “\w This|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* really \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*? \w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w why|strong="H3651"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Baal-zebub|strong="H1176"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w god|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*? \w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w get|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w bed|strong="H4296"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w lying|strong="H1697"\w*. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* Ahaziah \w died|strong="H4191"\w* according \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H1696"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* \w succeeded|strong="H8478"\w* \w him|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w over|strong="H4427"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w As|strong="H1697"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Ahaziah, \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w accomplishments|strong="H6213"\w*, \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?
